name: Aesthetics
effect: +25% great person generation in all cities
uniques: +[25]% great person generation in all cities

policies.name: Fine Arts
policies.effect: 50% of excess happiness added to culture towards policies
uniques: 50% of excess happiness added to culture towards policies

policies.name: Cultural Centers
policies.effect: Building time of culture buildings reduced by 15%

policies.name: Flourishing Of The Arts

uniques: +33% culture in all cities with a world wonder

policies.name: Cultural Exchange
policies.effect: Reduce culture cost of future policies by 10%
uniques: Culture cost of adopting new Policies reduced by 10%

policies.name: Aesthetics Complete
